Module org.example.miniproyecto_3
Package org.example.miniproyecto_3.Model

Interface IShip

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Ship, ShipAdapter
public interface IShip extends Serializable
Represents a ship in the game.

This interface defines common operations and properties that any type of ship must implement, such as orientation and sunk state.

This interface extends Serializable to support object persistence.

    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    IShip.Orientation
    Represents the orientation of a ship on the board.
    static enum 
    IShip.State
    Represents the sinking state of a ship.

  • Method Details

    • isSunk

      boolean isSunk()
      Determines whether the ship has been sunk.
      Returns:
      true if the ship is sunk, false otherwise

    • setSunk

      void setSunk(IShip.State state)
      Sets the sinking state of the ship.
      Parameters:
      state - the new sinking IShip.State of the ship

    • getOrientation

      IShip.Orientation getOrientation()
      Returns the IShip.Orientation of the ship.
      Returns:
      the orientation of the ship

    • flip

      void flip()
      Flips the orientation of the ship.

      If the ship is currently IShip.Orientation.HORIZONTAL, it becomes IShip.Orientation.VERTICAL, and vice versa.
